attributes.title: I AM HORRIFIED
attributes.review: dear all, i am just as DISAPPOINTED AND DISGUSTED as you are. if you are thinking of downloading this app, DONT. I cannot put into words how TERRIBLE AND PAINFUL this app has made my life. As the app was downloading on my phone, it erased EVERYTHING. all previous apps that i downloaded were GONE. it had even changed my wall papers to a picture of our amazing president. Then, it proceeded to take over my entire phone. My brand new iphone was starting to shake and buzz. i was terrified by its behavior. my phone then started to change appearance and turned into a giant pipe bomb. It ended up exploding my entire family. All that remained in my home is the trump flag in my living room. ZERO STARS. WORST APP IM THE WORLD DO NOT RECOMMEND.
